```python
import logging

class BankAccount:
    def __init__(self, initial_balance=0):
        """Kh·ªüi t·∫°o t√†i kho·∫£n ng√¢n h√†ng v·ªõi s·ªë d∆∞ ban ƒë·∫ßu t√πy ch·ªçn."""

        if amount <= 0:

        self.balance += amount
        logging.info(f"ƒê√£ g·ª≠i {amount}. S·ªë d∆∞ m·ªõi l√† {self.balance}.")

    def withdraw(self, amount):

        if amount <= 0:

        if amount > self.balance:
            raise ValueError("Kh√¥ng ƒë·ªß ti·ªÅn trong t√†i kho·∫£n.")
        self.balance -= amount
        logging.info(f"ƒê√£ r√∫t {amount}. S·ªë d∆∞ m·ªõi l√† {self.balance}.")

    def get_balance(self):

        return self.balance
```
